title.rendered: Capital District Regional Planning Commission Enrollment Study

content.rendered:
The Capital District Regional Planning Commission recently presented our school district’s enrollment projections.  Similar to many school districts in the Capital Region, student enrollment in Saratoga Springs City School District is expected to decline over the next five years.  Enrollment data is crucial to the district’s long- and short-term planning.

Click here to view the enrollment study.

The Capital District Regional Planning Commission is a regional planning resource center serving the Capital Region. CDRPC provides objective data analysis, trends, economic forecasting, and other services to all the region’s municipalities.
